br.span: The Twinsburg City School District is closed, Monday, March 16th through Friday, May 1st. Students will be learning from home during this period......
Earlier today, we received formal notice from The University of Akron, that all events at EJ Thomas Hall have been cancelled through May 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic.....

img.title: you are fantastic keep up the great work
img.alt: you are fantastic keep up the great work

br.span: Although our monthly Students of the Month recognition has been paused due to this school closure, we want to give a great big “Tiger Shout Out” to all of our students for their efforts in learning from home.....

We’ve received so many wonderful compliments about our fantastic staff members for all they are doing to support our students during this school closure. Here is an example of an email recently received.....

img.title: twinsburg schools today
img.span: Check Out Our April Edition of "Twinsburg Schools Today"

span.div: Superintendent Kathi Powers and Business Manager Chad Welker update the school community about the state of the District during the COVID-19 school closure during the April edition of "Twinsburg Schools Today". Click here to access the April edition.

img.title: children of the world uniting
img.a: Story Behind "Children of the World - Uniting"

br.span: We are very Tiger Proud of our very talented students who performed the song, "Children of the World - Uniting" the inspirational piece about having hope in this time of global health crisis......

img.title: 2020 best communities for music education
img.a: TCSD is Designated a "2020 Best Community for Music Education"

br.span: TCSD is Designated a "2020 Best Community for Music Education!" This year, 754 school districts across the nation were designated by NAMM for this honor.....

img.title: meal icon
img.a: Participation in the Twinsburg City School District's COVID-19 Meal Program

br.span: During the school closure for COVID-19, the Twinsburg City School District will continue to make breakfast and lunches available to students who are eligible for the Federal Free and Reduced-Price Meal Program or...

img.title: chromebook with tools on screen
img.a: Service on TCSD Issued Student Chromebooks During School Closure

br.span: During the extended period of school closure, if you have a broken/dead Twinsburg City School District issued Student Chromebook please click on the title of this article on how to proceed....
